title: The Officer's Hands
description: Kasha Bettingfield has spent her life getting things right. With a career hunting bad apples in powerful corporations, she has the money, influence, connections, and resources to get what she wants. But this is a game that wears thin. When you're always the one in control, little is ever exciting.When Kasha overhears a trio of police officers sharing their violent fantasies, something unexpected and undeniable awakens inside her. Unable to pull her thoughts away from what she overheard, she follows a trail of bad decisions to a dangerous encounter that could change the entire course of her life.
author: Taylor Maddings
